title: Celtics Can’t Take the Heat in Eastern Conference Finals Game 2 Loss | The Mismatch
description:
The Heat beat the Celtics to go up 2-0 in the Eastern Conference finals, and Chris and Kevin got together after the game to talk about the Celtics’ meltdown in the face of Miami’s zone defense (0:40), the matchup between the Lakers and Nuggets (39:26), and what moves the Clippers might make in the offseason (50:58).

Hosts: Chris Vernon and Kevin O’Connor
